alert.note: Alert for Lancaster (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 03 at 4:01PM EDT until June 03 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: The National Weather Service in Columbia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Lancaster County in central South Carolina... * Until 500 PM EDT. * At 401 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Indian Land to near Fort Lawn, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... Lancaster, Indian Land, Elgin, Andrew Jackson State Park, USC Lancaster, Van Wyck, Irwin, Buford, Arrowood Estates, Tradesville, Camp Creek Fire Station, Community of Almond Glen, Antioch, Kirk Air Base, Forty Acre Rock Preserve, Taxahaw, Unity Fire Station, Lancaster Mill, Carolina Commons Shopping Center and McWhirter Airfield. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection seek shelter inside a sturdy building and stay away from windows.
